projects.title: Abugida
projects.description: Created my own interpreted programming language using Python.
features: Basic data types like numbers, strings and lists.
Control flow statements like if-else, for and while loops.
Built-in functions like print, input, len, etc.

projects.title: Smart Garage
projects.description: A mobile app making use of IoT cloud platforms to enable authorized users to control their Smart garage and Delivery box remotely using their smart phone.
features: Enable users to get notified if their garage/delivery box is left open for long time.
Enable users to set auto-close mode to be engaged after a specific time.

projects.title: Sau ES
projects.description: A custom encryption standard inspired mainly by the DES standard. It is a symmetric key encryption standard.

projects.title: Sky Booking
projects.description: This project is a mobile app that allows users to make flight reservations.
features: Enable users to search for flights based on their origin and destination.
Enable users to view their booked flights.

projects.title: Food Corner
projects.description: Developed a full-stack web application for online food ordering.

projects.title: Dispatcher Shell
projects.description: Process dispatcher shell executing processes based on their priority and arrival time using Multilevel Feedback Queue and FCFS Real Time Queue.
